result:
The void is very comforting and safe, isn't that right? Here you have nothing to fear, nothing to risk, nothing to expose, it's the perfect bubble, nothing happens!
You don't look very comfortable or safe, am I wrong? Few are the ones who deserve the void. I'm here to alert you, you can still deserve it, but one thing is for sure: after you start, there is no turning back!
Something bigger is bound to happen soon and your actions will influence what will happen, how do you feel after knowing all this?
